CustomField.formula:
((If( AND (TEXT(FS_CS_All_Ftn_Removed__c) ="Yes" , NOT( FS_Indicator_FTN_Removal_Chk__c ), Today()-FS_Max_Installation_Date__c >30), "*Required",
(If(AND(TEXT(FS_CS_All_Ftn_Removed__c) ="Yes" , FS_Indicator_FTN_Removal_Chk__c),"Complete",
(If(AND(TEXT(FS_CS_All_Ftn_Removed__c)="No" , FS_Indicator_FTN_Removal_Chk__c),"*Needs to be Removed","Not Needed")))))))
CustomField.label: Indicator FTN Removal Status
